title: Elite Theme System (Pandora Premium Dark)
acceptanceCriteria: All pages render with the new premium dark tokens (neutral surfaces, clean borders, minimal effects)
No legacy neon/glow styling is required for readability or focus indication
Brand accents (cube2 cyan/violet) are applied sparingly: primary action, focus ring, brand moments
checklist: Replace CSS variables in globals.css (background/surface/border/input/ring/typography defaults)
Update tailwind.config.ts palette + shadows to match premium system
Normalize shared utilities (glass panels, inputs, scrollbars) to avoid neon noise
Audit and remove/replace legacy neon classes across components

title: Elite App Shell (ChatGPT-like Navigation + Mobile Drawer)
acceptanceCriteria: All app pages use the new shell (no per-page bespoke navigation)

checklist: Create new shell components (AppSidebar, AppTopbar, AppFrame) and wire them into layout.tsx
